name: Super Billiard Chalk
description:
Run, shoot and snook.
MADE FOR LUDUM DARE COMPO 41

One-man team. Theme was "two incompatible genre". So, I made an action platformer with billiard mecanics. Short game, 9 stages.

CONTROLS : Keyboard & Mouse

  • Move : "A" & "D" ("Q"&"D")
  • Jump : "Space"
  • Shoot : Click with the mouse near the character, aim, then release.

Progression is saved or your browser.
